title: Tutorial Dashboard
description: Built-in tutorial demonstrating core dashboardr features: bar charts, timelines, heatmaps, stacked bars, and interactive sidebar filters.
author: dashboardr team

title: Showcase Dashboard
description: Feature showcase highlighting value boxes, multi-page layouts, themed charts, and advanced content blocks.
author: dashboardr team

title: GSS Data Explorer
description: Interactive sidebar dashboard with cascading radio filters exploring General Social Survey data across demographics.
author: dashboardr team

title: DigIQ Monitor
description: Digital information quality monitoring dashboard tracking Dutch news media metrics in real-time.
author: Fabio Votta
